'''''Children of the Forest''''' is the second quest in the [[World Quest]] series [[Aranyaka]]: Part II - [[Dream Nursery]].

==Steps==
# Adventure with [[Aranara]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* To progress past step 1, the following must be completed:
** [[Agnihotra Sutra]] quest series
** [[An Unwavering Culinary Dream]] quest series
** [[Varuna Gatha]] quest series and its following quest:
*** ''[[Sprouting Seedlings]]''
** [[Vimana Agama]] quest series
** ''[[Encounter in the Woods]]'' quest and its following quests:
*** ''[[The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path]]''
*** ''[[The Rhythm that Nurtures the Sprout]]''
*** ''[[The Rhythm that Reveals the Beastly Trail]]''
* After all the requisite quests are complete, this quest will automatically complete.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|To acquire [[Bija]] and help [[Rana]], you have to find and help Aranara, and prepare for [[Festival Utsava]]. As for the Aranyaka from Arama, it could be used to document the stories about Aranara, and clues for the adventure.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(There is no dialogue for this quest)
{{Dialogue end}}

==Trivia==
* When this quest is selected using the "Navigate" button, pressing 'V' will open the [[Aranyaka (Gadget)]], rather than having to open it from the [[Inventory]]'s Quest Items section manually.
